Hello! Welcome to the wiiboxing3d user guide! 



1. = Game Requirements = 

There are several programs that you need to have for the game to run:

  - .NET Framework 3.5, which is provided in <a href = "http://www.microsoft.com/express/Downloads/#2008-Visual-CS">Visual C# 2008</a>

  - XNA Framework Redistributable 3.1, which is provided in <a href = "http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=80782277-d584-42d2-8024-893fcd9d3e82&displaylang=en">XNA 3.1</a> 

There are also several devices that you should have for the game to run:

  - bluetooth-enabled computer <insert picture>

  - IR glasses <insert picture>

  - 2 Wiimotes <insert picture>
